entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 1:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Fog. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
